thread.title_full: Doctor Who: Jodie Whittaker shares what she thinks is the "best thing" about the Doctor | Popverse

author: @NY_Comic_Con
title: Doctor Who: Jodie Whittaker shares what she thinks is the "best thing" about the Doctor | Popverse
text: Doctor Who: Jodie Whittaker shares what she thinks is the "best thing" about the Doctor "The Doctor is all of us" Popverse's top stories of the day [Disney is slowing down Marvel Studios' release schedule: Here's what that could mean](https://www.thepopverse.com/disney-is-slowing-down-marvel-studios-release-schedule-heres-what-that-could-mean) - Watch: [Cosplay champion Sameer Tikka Masala finds success and support in the creative performance community](https://www.thepopverse.com/cosplay-champion-sameer-tikka-masala-nycc-2023-new-york-comic-con-interview) [The Lord of the Rings and Middle-earth as a whole is about to begin its Golden (Second) Age](https://www.thepopverse.com/the-lord-of-the-rings-rings-of-power-war-of-rohirrim-jrr-tolkien-embracer-group-middle-earth) The Doctor is an exciting character, with (at least) fifteen faces... and that's only so far. In fact, this is the coolest part of the character, which the Doctor herself, Jodie Whittaker is happy to point out. This year, Popverse had a chance to moderate the [Jodie Whittaker Spotlight panel](https://www.thepopverse.com/jodie-whittaker-doctor-who-eccc-2024-emerald-city-comic-con) at Emerald City Comic Con, and in the panel, Whittaker chatted everything from costume, to stunts, to the different peculiarities of her own turn as the Doctor - as well as what makes the role so special. Watch Jodie Whittaker sharing why she thinks the Doctor is so great above! [Become a Popverse member to watch the full Jodie Whittaker Spotlight panel from Emerald City Comic Con 2024. ](https://www.thepopverse.com/jodie-whittaker-doctor-who-eccc-2024-emerald-city-comic-con) If you want to start watching Doctor Who and don't know where to start, check out our handy [Doctor Who watch guide](https://www.thepopverse.com/doctor-who-watch-order-bbc-disney-plus-tv-show-where-streaming-how). Or maybe you're already finished with the show - We've got the perfect [Ten shows to watch when you're done watching Doctor Who guide](https://www.thepopverse.com/doctor-who-tv-show-bbc-disney-plus-netflix-similar-recommended) for you too. If you're already heads over heels for the Fifteenth Doctor and want to [learn more about the actor playing him, check out what he's been in before here](https://www.thepopverse.com/ncuti-gatwa-doctor-who-sex-education-bbc-netflix-david-tennant-jodie-whittaker). Or maybe you just need to [figure out how the new series numbering is going to work (Are there really gonna be two series 1s? Yes.) - if so, this is the explainer you want](https://www.thepopverse.com/doctor-who-guide-season-series-numbering).
